State.Author: iranrmrf
State.Description: This library will replace the in-game heap with a faster, more optimized version. It should decrease load times, remove some stutter and slightly improve frame rate.
State.Name: New Vegas Heap Replacer

State.Author: Roy Batty - LuthienAnarion
State.Description: Simple patcher to make Fallout New Vegas 4GB Aware. Supports all known Steam and GoG versions. The Bethesda.net and XBOX Game pass versions are NOT supported since NVSE will not support them either.
State.Name: FNV 4GB Patcher

State.Author: Yukichigai
State.Description: Alters the Varmint Rifle to use .22LR rounds instead of 5.56mm rounds, as it was intended to during development.  Also alters the unique Ratslayer weapon.
State.Name: 22LR Varmint Rifle - Restoration

State.Author: zedas
State.Description: An enhancement to the shoddy work on the vanilla functional streetlamps & lights of Outer Vegas, Camp McCarran, Camp Golf, and NCRCF.
State.Name: A Little More Lamplight

State.Author: coach shogun 20
State.Description: Adds several traits that allow you to build a past for your character and slightly modify your stats.
State.Name: A Roleplayers History

State.Author: Rachel
State.Description: Adds 3 new traits (Merchant, NCR Quartermaster, and NCR Recon) to the game.
State.Name: A Roleplayers History - More History

State.Author: JamesiaInc or Patchier
State.Description: A further expansion, and slight tweaking, of the "A Roleplayer's History" series of mods, adding a few of my own in the process.
State.Name: A Roleplayer's History - Patchy's Picks

State.Author: Zenorant
State.Description: Removes some objects at the Underpass area to stop conflicts between AWoLP and Living Desert.
State.Name: A World of (Less) Pain - A Living Desert Compatibility Patch

State.Author: djmystro - Qolore7
State.Description: Complete stripping down/balancing of A World of Pain. Removes all unvoiced NPCs, quests, and un-lore friendly interiors, as well as heavily balancing the remaining locations.
State.Name: A World of (Less) Pain - A Lore Friendly AWOP Revision

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: Vastly improves all the weathers in the game, without stepping on the toes of vanilla New Vegas's design too much. TTW version available!
State.Name: Altitude - A Vanilla Plus Weather Mod

State.Author: CaBaL
State.Description: high resolution texture replacement
State.Name: aMidianBorn NV Book Of Water

State.Author: c6 but uploaded by JamesiaInc
State.Description: Adds a small dialogue check (requiring 8+ Intelligence) to translate" Nihi Nove Sub Sole" when Arcade is speaking to you, resulting in being able to recruit him by showing your knowledge.
State.Name: Arcade respects your intellect

State.Author: Yamatohime
State.Description: Turn books, hides and scrap metal into armor pads made of paper, leather or metal to boost your defense.
State.Name: Armor Padding

State.Author: Xilandro - master JazzIsParis - DarianStephens
State.Description: This mod adds weapon inertia. Part of Project B42. Thanks to JazzIsMagic... I mean Paris. ;)
State.Name: B42 Weapon Inertia

State.Author: baddarkl
State.Description: Overhauls several neglected perks. Adds a few new perks and traits. Balances many others.
State.Name: Baddarkl Perk Overhaul

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: Improves the character creation by speeding up the process, adding specialized gear based on your tag skills, and making Wild Wasteland an opt-in feature rather than a trait.
State.Name: Better Character Creation

State.Author: mememaster8427
State.Description: In the Bitter Springs Infirmary Blues quest, you can give Lieutenant Markland training on the topics of pediatric care and psychological care like Arcade can.
State.Name: Bitter Springs Medicine Skill Check

State.Author: darthbdaman
State.Description:
Cleans up the aMidianBorn NV Book Of Steel plugins, which contain numerous edits that cause needless incompatibility with other mods, making them easier to use.



Also includes support for Enclave Power Armors Retextured and Tale of Two Wastelands
State.Name: Book of Steel - Compatibility Edition

State.Author: The BNW Team
State.Description: Brave New World is a project that gathers the work of professional voice actors, carefully selected to revoice Fallout: New Vegas. The mod revoices roughly 7,000 lines of vanilla dialogue and covers 145 NPCs.
State.Name: Brave New World

State.Author: migck
State.Description: falut niu begas companions ungood, me make mod to companions better
State.Name: Companion and Perk Tweaks

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: Makes vendors only buy items related to their profession (e.g. doctors only buy aid items). Fully scripted, no conflicts.
State.Name: Complex Vendors

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a lore-friendly, mostly hand-drawn, total overhaul mod that tweaks around 3600 icons which made them immersively more consistent in terms of coloring and transparency. There are other bug fixes too, and many new details! Okay, just write that in the brief overview, it's not that hard.
State.Name: Consistent Pip-Boy Icons

State.Author: Eddoursul - Project Nevada Team - TTW Team
State.Description: Standalone Cyberware from Project Nevada.
State.Name: Cyberware 2281

State.Author: Random411
State.Description: A mystery quest mod, set in an entirely new region to explore.
State.Name: Darkwood Falls

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: A simple, highly compatible overhaul of New Vegas's economy, aiming to make buying and selling more rewarding and plausible.
State.Name: Economy Overhaul

State.Author: th3overseer
State.Description: A new companion for you to go on adventures with, a bunch of new quests and characters, a new town, and as always, at least one snazzy hat. All fully-voiced and play-tested beyond the bounds of sanity.
State.Name: Eliza

State.Author: dDefinder
State.Description: Increases the resolution size from 256 to 1024 and created new textures for screen, world, wounds, static blood decals and gore. Esps are used to increase the size appearance of the blood. Adjustments for screenblood, add more giblets and new wounds related to the weapon type. Ini will change max amount and lifetime for blood.
State.Name: Enhanced Blood Textures for NV v2_22c

State.Author: Ionami
State.Description: Adds a few useful map markers to the World Map for more convenient Fast Travel. There is also an optional file to enable markers for nearly every hidden/unmarked location of note in the Wasteland.
State.Name: Extra Map Markers 2.0

State.Author: Ionami
State.Description: Adds a few useful map markers to the World Map for more convenient Fast Travel. There is also an optional file to enable markers for nearly every hidden/unmarked location of note in the Wasteland.
State.Name: Extra Map Markers 2.0

State.Author: The Frontier team
State.Description: Fallout: The Frontier is a gigantic DLC/New Game. As the “Courier” you start a new adventure centered around a conflict between the NCR and the Legion in the snow blasted remains of Portland Oregon. Featuring 3 major questlines, 60+ side quests, hundreds of new armours, weapons and items, and tens of thousands of lines of new voiced dialogue!
State.Name: Fallout - The Frontier

State.Author: The Frontier team
State.Description: Fallout: The Frontier is a gigantic DLC/New Game. As the “Courier” you start a new adventure centered around a conflict between the NCR and the Legion in the snow blasted remains of Portland Oregon. Featuring 3 major questlines, 60+ side quests, hundreds of new armours, weapons and items, and tens of thousands of lines of new voiced dialogue!
State.Name: Fallout - The Frontier

Original.Name: Fallout Tactics Brotherhood Metal Armor Integration-70112-1-1-1602764740.zip

State.Author: jojonexus
State.Description: Hello Folks! Here again but instead of a replacer it's a integration mod.. This mod integrates the Brotherhood Metal Armor from Fallout Tactics into the BOS Initiate leveled lists. Credits to jojonexus for giving me permission to use his assets.
State.Name: Fallout Tactics Brotherhood Metal Armor Integration

State.Author: tgspy
State.Description: Makes a number of changes to Fallout: The Frontier in the name of improving gameplay and removing sections of tedium. Namely removes the Hardcase rescue section, an extremely annoying vertibird fight, makes changes to buff the player in other vertibird battles, and more to come!
State.Name: Fallout The Frontier - Tgspy Changes

State.Author: cbgreely
State.Description: Adds Traits that do the opposite of what some vanilla Traits do. Now with OWB Traits!
State.Name: FNV Opposite Traits

State.Author: Ehamloptiran Sheson and FNVEdit Team
State.Description: An almost one click LOD generator for Fallout: New Vegas
State.Name: FNVLODGen

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: Changes the amount of followers for you can have to your Charisma stat/2, rounded down. Charisma is no longer a dump stat!
State.Name: Follower Formula Redone

State.Author: ryanmar
State.Description: A number of patches I put together to make certain mods play nice with kazopert's Functional Post-Game Ending.
State.Name: FPGE Patch Collection

Original.Name: FPGE Patch -  Meat Preparation Animation Restored-71492-1-0-1614404407.zip

State.Author: ryanmar
State.Description: A number of patches I put together to make certain mods play nice with kazopert's Functional Post-Game Ending.
State.Name: FPGE Patch Collection

Original.Name: FPGE Patch - The Town of Vice-71492-1-0-1614404664.zip

State.Author: ryanmar
State.Description: A number of patches I put together to make certain mods play nice with kazopert's Functional Post-Game Ending.
State.Name: FPGE Patch Collection

Original.Name: FPGE Patch - The True Revival of Luxury-71492-1-0-1614404748.zip

State.Author: ryanmar
State.Description: A number of patches I put together to make certain mods play nice with kazopert's Functional Post-Game Ending.
State.Name: FPGE Patch Collection

Original.Name: Functional Post Game Ending - FOMOD Installation-66726-4-0-1-1603991011.7z

State.Author: Kazopert
State.Description: Adds a fully functional post-game world to the game, no longer will you be brought to the credits and end your journey there. Instead, you will realise the consequences of what endings you've gotten and explore a vastly changed world.
State.Name: FPGE - Functional Post Game Ending

State.Author: SHAD0WC0BRA
State.Description: Makes the GRA unique weapons unavailable for purchase and scatters them across the Mojave, Zion, and the Big MT - just like all the other unique weapons.
State.Name: GRA Unique Weapons Relocated

State.Author: th3overseer
State.Description: A new quest mod by th3overseer. 30 unique quests for you and your buddies to experience. All fully voice-acted and play-tested, well beyond the bounds of sanity.
State.Name: Headhunting

State.Author: AlvisHael
State.Description: A follow-up to my previous mod. Adds new dialogue options to convince Joshua at the end of Crush the White Legs. Does not feature any unvoiced dialogue or fan-made audio.
State.Name: Honest Hearts Ending Dialogue Expanded

State.Author: The Strict Nein
State.Description: Allows you to start the 'I Fought the Law' quest even if the Powder Gangers hate you
State.Name: I Fought the Law - NCR Start

State.Author: Tau34RUS
State.Description: Re-Texture of Vanilla Heavy Weapons
State.Name: IHWT - Improved Heavy Weapons Textures

State.Author: Cyberlazy
State.Description: Vastly improves the LOD noise texture used on all distant land. Uses only minimal video memory and greatly improves quality.
State.Name: Improved LOD Noise Texture

State.Author: yvileapsis and others
State.Description:
A collection of my mods, merged for convenience. 

Requires JIP LN NVSE and JohnnyGuitar NVSE.
State.Name: JAM - Just Assorted Mods

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: This mod is designed to revolutionize the way companions are controlled and interacted with, rendering the companion-wheel obsolete and bringing new elements of team-work and tactics, with the intention of making the game look and feel more as a proper role-playing game than as an action-shooter.
State.Name: JIP Companions Command and Control

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: This mod makes the crafting interface (Recipe Menu) easier, more efficient and less tedious to use.
State.Name: JIP Improved Recipe Menu

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: This mod introduces a selective-fire system to Fallout: New Vegas. Most projectile-type weapons, capable of automatic fire, will have two or more optional fire-modes for the player to switch between: single/burst/auto.
State.Name: JIP Selective-Fire

State.Author: Machienzo
State.Description: Fixes the Explorer Armor mesh.
State.Name: Legion Explorer Armor Fix

State.Author: Faram aka Biohazard
State.Description: An immersive and lore friendly overhaul for the town of Primm which focuses on environmental storytelling to make the town feel like a proper, believable and realistic pre-war and post war settlement. New NPCs, buildings, clutter, notes, terminal entries, enemies, unique weapons and a more fleshed out settlement as a whole.
State.Name: Less Empty Primm - A Primm Town Overhaul

State.Author: Faram aka Biohazard
State.Description: An immersive and lore friendly overhaul for the town of Primm which focuses on environmental storytelling to make the town feel like a proper, believable and realistic pre-war and post war settlement. New NPCs, buildings, clutter, notes, terminal entries, enemies, unique weapons and a more fleshed out settlement as a whole.
State.Name: Less Empty Primm - A Primm Town Overhaul

State.Author: tomzik
State.Description: A collection of new, low poly models to use during generating LOD.
State.Name: LOD additions and improvements

Original.Name: Luxe Aeterna - The True Revival of Luxury-63251-1-00-1591303669.zip

State.Author: Faram aka Biohazard
State.Description: A lore friendly overhaul for the Ultra-Luxe, transforming it into what it should have been from the start, a unique casino with a classic luxury aesthetic and design. A lot of new assets, NPC, lighting and textures changes to transform the Ultra-Luxe into the true revival of luxury.
State.Name: Lux Aeterna - The True Revival of Luxury - An Ultra-Luxe Overhaul

State.Author: ashjay101
State.Description: Adds a few minor alterations to the main story, allowing you some more freedoms during the game in an immersive, seamless, lore-friendly way.
State.Name: Main Story Alterations

State.Author: Babaloo321
State.Description: This mod makes Manny Vargas' room, and everything inside, owned by him and no longer public property. Also makes his terminal locked behind a Average level lock.
State.Name: Manny Vargas Room Ownership

State.Author: Blooper Reel
State.Description: Restores an unfinished animation marker with unique meat preparation animations and adds them across the Mojave. Also available as a modder's resource.
State.Name: Meat Prep Animations Restored

State.Author: Qolore7 - tdx73
State.Description: Remake of tdx73's amazing Mobile Truck Base mod, modernizing the mod and fixing many longstanding issues
State.Name: Mobile Truck Base Remastered

State.Author: ledzepiv
State.Description: This mod adds several NPCs in major areas like Freeside, McCarran, The Fort and around the Mojave, dead bodies and creatures in places they'd fit and restores some unused animations found in the game's files.
State.Name: Mojave NPCs - Another Population Mod

State.Author: ledzepiv
State.Description: This mod adds several NPCs in major areas like Freeside, McCarran, The Fort and around the Mojave, dead bodies and creatures in places they'd fit and restores some unused animations found in the game's files.
State.Name: Mojave NPCs - Another Population Mod

State.Author: pilamin
State.Description: Adds new distant level-of-detail to many world objects; from vehicles, roads, barricades, and lots of rocks.
State.Name: Much Needed LOD

State.Author: Oliver Swanick
State.Description:
300 lore-friendly, normalised tracks for Radio NV, nearly all those referenced in-game, and one (1) bajillion customisable features.

Feature creep done right.  You want this.
State.Name: Music Pack for Radio NV - 300 Songs.

State.Author: pwinkle
State.Description: Distributed the amazing NCR armours made by Dragbody to the trooper and ranger leveled lists.
State.Name: NCR Trooper Overhaul - Distributed

State.Author: Sandtwister200
State.Description: This mod aims to make Nellis Air Force Base actually feel like a military airbase with the addition of Jets, more munitions, cleaning around unnecessary junk adding vehicles, weapons, and more other details that Nellis should've had. At the moment this mod is in 1.0 stage meaning that it'll have more updates in the future which will add more things
State.Name: Nellis Air Force Base Lightweight Overhaul

State.Author: Qolore7 - Dracomies
State.Description: A complete cleanup and revision of Dracomies wonderful New Vegas Redesigned 2, similar to Qwinn's Redesigned 3
State.Name: New Vegas Redesigned 2 Revised

Original.Name: NMC New Vegas Patch for ALL Sized packs-43135-1-1-1566493738.7z

State.Author: NeilMc_NMC
State.Description: Fallout New Vegas Texture pack by NeilMc_NMC: re-textures roads, trees, landscape, vehicles buildings and interiors with high-resolution photographic based equivalent textures. Global texture replacer. Does not retexture the DLC.
State.Name: NMCs_Texture_Pack_For_New_Vegas

State.Author: chucksteel -  Bigcrazewolf - Qolore7
State.Description: Complete overhaul of chucksteel's fantastic NV Intereriors mod, fixing bugs, savebloat, typos, balance, and makes it fit much better with the vanilla game. REQUIRES THE ORIGINAL NV INTERIORS MOD!
State.Name: NV Interiors Remastered

State.Author: Smithy
State.Description: This mod is an attempt at balancing Stimpaks and making builds centered around drugs a bit more involved and interesting by adding new mechanic to the game: Overdosing. Taking too many Drugs or Stimpaks in a short period of time will make your character overdose, debuffing them. MCM Configurable. Also adds a new Perk related to this mechanic.
State.Name: Overdose

State.Author: JamesiaInc or Patchier
State.Description: A further expansion, and slight tweaking, of the "A Roleplayer's History" series of mods, adding a few of my own in the process.
State.Name: A Roleplayer's History - Patchy's Picks

State.Author: Cheesehole and Demorome
State.Description: Adds various new perks suited for specialization and to add spice to your build.
State.Name: PerkPackPlus

Original.Name: Pre-Order Packs Scattered - YUP Compatibility Version-72498-1-0-1622438570.zip

State.Author: cbgreely and Mudguy47
State.Description: Fixes a slight incompatibility between YUP and Mudguy47's Pre-Order Packs Scattered
State.Name: Pre-Order Packs Scattered - YUP Compatibility Version

State.Author: Mastahbossu
State.Description: Delays DLC until you meet certain requirements, no more quests and messages as soon as you step out of Doc Mitchell's house.
State.Name: Simple DLC Delay

State.Author: Qolore 7 - Anro24
State.Description: Simple scripted interior lighting overhaul. Automatically works with any mod
State.Name: Simple Interior Lighting Overhaul

State.Author: yvileapsis
State.Description: The Frontier is a great mod, but undoubtedly it has suffered from questionable choices of the developers. This mod attempts to fix the issues with the Pip-Boy map and navigation.
State.Name: TFRC - The Frontier Re-Cut - Map

State.Author: th3overseer
State.Description: It's an ESM that allows certain decisions to carry over between my mods.
State.Name: Th3Overseer's Core ESM

State.Author: JamesiaInc or Patchier
State.Description: Replaces the persuasion dialogue for Ghost Town Gunfight to be less about the "bullets and explosions" and more about the actual people of Goodsprings.
State.Name: The Courier Cares about Goodsprings

State.Author: th3overseer
State.Description: Delve into the midst of some of the worst people and organizations that post-apocalyptic life has to offer. Investigate conspiracies, make new friends, meet interesting people and then kill them. All fully voiced and playtested to an neurotic degree. Contains a series of quests, as well as a companion that doesn't complain about much.
State.Name: The Depths of Depravity

State.Author: th3overseer
State.Description: A (slightly) light-hearted quest mod by th3overseer. Comes complete with quests, adventures, missions, jobs, and everything else you'd expect from a quest mod. Also, fully voiced and exhaustively bug-tested.
State.Name: The High Desert

State.Author: th3overseer
State.Description: A brand new, fully voice-acted, multi-part quest with plenty of difficult combat.
State.Name: The Initiation

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: Just a little mod to beef up the NCR troopers that spawn in to help retake NCRCF.
State.Name: The Law Fought Back

State.Author: Made by ElPascal - v1 61 kindly provided by Kazopert
State.Description: This mod adds hundreds of npcs and several scripted events to the world of Fallout: New Vegas; people patrolling the roads, traveling between towns, occupying locations, exploring the desert and reacting dynamically to your choices throughout the game. The Mojave will never feel empty again.
State.Name: The Living Desert - Travelers Patrols Consequences Increased Population and more

State.Author: Pelinor
State.Description: Allows any number of mods to be configured from a single menu.
State.Name: The Mod Configuration Menu

State.Author: Pelinor
State.Description: Allows any number of mods to be configured from a single menu.
State.Name: The Mod Configuration Menu

Original.Name: The Mogul Mausoleum - A Lucky 38 Overhaul-66622-0-17-1583408175.zip

State.Author: Faram AKA Biohazard
State.Description: An overhaul aimed at fixing the glaring flaws and unfinished aspects of the Lucky 38. Restored E3 lights, Photos of Mr. House, New unique clutter and an overhauled penthouse.
State.Name: The Mogul Mausoleum - A Lucky 38 Overhaul

State.Author: chucksteel Bigcrazewolf
State.Description: Have you ever ben exploring the Mojave Waste, thinking to yourself There's just nothing out here to investigate? If So, This mod is for you! As the sister mod to Fallout 3's D.C. Interiors Project, N.V. Interiors promises to bring many of the elements you've come to know and love, into Fallout New Vagas. I also hope to add more dept
State.Name: The N.V. Interiors Project

State.Author: th3overseer
State.Description: I did a well-received quest mod called the North Road a ways back. This is that same mod, only better in every capacity.
State.Name: The North Road Remastered

State.Author: Faram aka Biohazard
State.Description: A lore friendly overhaul for Gomorrah and the Omertas adding new, unique and lore friendly posters, rugs, curtains, outfits and weapons for the Omertas.
State.Name: The Town of Vice - A Gomorrah Overhaul

State.Author: Random411
State.Description: Adds a detailed, atmospheric new world to explore with dungeons, voiced characters and more.
State.Name: The Unholy Lands

State.Author: sandbox6
State.Description:
Restores a huge amount of scenery and little random things which were patched out of the game post-release.

And because people asked for them, the fluff NPCs and creatures too.

This mod puts it all back. Well, the worthwhile stuff anyway.
State.Name: Uncut Wasteland

State.Author: VariableEagle
State.Description: Intended for use ONLY with JIP NVSE LN's bLocalizedDTDR game fix. This multiplies the DT value (and optionally increases the DR) of all headwear from every loaded plugin. Values and conditions can be adjusted in a config file.
State.Name: Universal Headwear DT Boost

State.Author: The UPNVSE Pals
State.Description: An updated and refined selection of bugfixes (mostly) requiring NVSE.
State.Name: Unofficial Patch NVSE Plus

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: Cleans up HUD textures (such as the compass ticks or other arrows) that have went unnoticed. The cleaning consists of removing the old noise, and sometimes i replace the old noise with a new one.
State.Name: Vanilla Hud Cleaned

State.Author: MaggotHATE
State.Description: A recoil mod that affects first person model only and doesn't move camera at all. Based on B42 Inertia implementation and Immersive Recoil 2+ code.
State.Name: Viewmodel Recoil - individual weapon recoil - MCM - custom profiles

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Overhauls various aspects of water in New Vegas to add more variety, make radiation-free water more scarce, and increase difficulty. Includes a highly compatible water bottling system allowing you to fill empty bottles at any water source.
State.Name: Water Overhaul

State.Author: Roy Batty
State.Description: Fixes for mesh errors, uv errors, incorrect flags, missing extra data, form lists, projectiles, and other weapon related bugs and errors.
State.Name: Weapon Mesh Improvement Mod

State.Author: Millenia
State.Description: This is a pack release containing all my New Vegas weapon retextures. This will be periodically updated but not necessarily immediately after I release something new.
State.Name: Weapon Retexture Project - WRP

State.Author: Millenia
State.Description: This is a pack release containing all my New Vegas weapon retextures. This will be periodically updated but not necessarily immediately after I release something new.
State.Name: Weapon Retexture Project - WRP

Original.Name: YUP - Base Game and All DLC-51664-12-2-1622237906.7z

State.Author: Yukichigai - Currently maintained by sandbox
State.Description: A compilation of vital bug fixes for Fallout: New Vegas and its DLC, all combined into one ESM.  The only pure bug fix compilation available on the Nexus: no new features, no balance tweaks, no restored content.  Just bug fixes and nothing but bug fixes.  Available in English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, and Russian.
State.Name: Yukichigai Unofficial Patch - YUP

State.Author: Hwiccian
State.Description: This mod provides a large new world space that joins the Mojave to Zion Valley There are new quests, new settlements, new characters, some new weapons and outfits and a new set of skill books, plus some other useful odds and ends if you can find them.
State.Name: Zion Trail

State.Author: Hwiccian
State.Description: This mod provides a large new world space that joins the Mojave to Zion Valley There are new quests, new settlements, new characters, some new weapons and outfits and a new set of skill books, plus some other useful odds and ends if you can find them.
State.Name: Zion Trail

State.Author: friendlynonmurderingsort
State.Description: Edits some landscape changes made by Hwiccian's Zion Trail that messed with an area from Th3overseer's Headhunting, Allowing you to fully enjoy both excellent mods!
State.Name: Zion Trail - Headhunting Landscape Patch

State.Author: friendlynonmurderingsort
State.Description: A mod for a mod enhancing your experience with the criminally overlooked Zion Trail by Hwiccian! Adds music, foliage, ambience, and much, much more!
State.Name: Zion Trail Enhanced

State.Author: emeraldreign nekronom cabal wjs dragbody
State.Description: Revamps the NCR troopers. Completely functional, but still a WIP. Check back for updates.
State.Name: NCR Trooper Overhaul_beta

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description:
A fully customisable engine plugin providing a collection of optional bugfixes, tweaks and new features to the game with no performance impact. 

Includes Inventory Searching, Cookable Grenades, Smooth Aiming, WASD Menu Support and more. Fully compatible with TTW and The Frontier.
State.Name: lStewieAl's Tweaks

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: An NVSE-powered plugin that is designed to manage and maintain all UI/HUD extensions added to the game by various mods. Once installed, UIO will ensure UI extensions are always properly installed and, when necessary, properly removed; it will automatically detect, resolve and prevent UI-related issues, and will help keep the game's UI intact.
State.Name: UIO - User Interface Organizer

Original.Name: BOA NV The Book Of Flesh-39873.7z

State.Author: CaBaL
State.Description: high resolution texture replacement
State.Name: aMidianBorn NV Book Of Water

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Plugin to add clipboard paste support, as well as ctrl left/right and backspace/delete to aid typing in console.
State.Name: Console Paste Support

State.Author: iranrmrf
State.Description: This plugin fixes the Fallout New Vegas mod limit bug. It allows a maximum of 255 plugins to be loaded. It can also cause an increase in fps, remove game stutter and allow for faster loading times especially when using a large number of mods.
State.Name: FNV Mod Limit Fix

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Improves framerate in combat by fixing an engine bug that lowered framerate while attacking an enemy with a health-bar visible.
State.Name: Combat Lag Fix (NVSE)

State.Author: Faram AKA Biohazard
State.Description:
Fixing the Mojave LOD, one eyesore at a time. 



LOD texture patches for NMCs, Poco/Ojo Beuno and George's landscape for proper LODs.
State.Name: FNV LOD Texture Patches

State.Author: Roy Batty - nukem - lStewieAl - jazzisparis - LuthienAnarion - carxt
State.Description: Project to extend GECK functionality and bug fixes.
State.Name: GECK Extender

State.Author: Hitman47101
State.Description: Full animation set for the 10mm Pistol and Weathered 10mm Pistol.
State.Name: Hit - 10mm Pistol Anim Set - kNVSE

State.Author: Hitman47101
State.Description: Full animation set for the 10mm Submachine Gun and Sleepytyme.
State.Name: Hit - 10mm SMG Anim Set - kNVSE

State.Author: Hitman47101

State.Author: jazzisparis and LuthienAnarion
State.Description:
This plugin is an extension of the New Vegas Script Extender (NVSE). It adds 900+ new functions, which can be used in GECK scripting and (in some cases) as conditions.

Additionally, this mod includes numerous engine bug fixes/tweaks, and restores several broken game features.
State.Name: JIP LN NVSE Plugin

State.Author: tgspy
State.Description: Fixes glowing armours when using aMidianBorn NV Book Of Water. All of CaBaL's meshes were missing proper flags to prevent the armours from glowing in the dark. This mod fixes that. No more glowing power armours, with or without ENB.

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description:
A fully customisable engine plugin providing a collection of optional bugfixes, tweaks and new features to the game with no performance impact. 

Includes Inventory Searching, Cookable Grenades, Smooth Aiming, WASD Menu Support and more. Fully compatible with TTW and The Frontier.
State.Name: lStewieAl's Tweaks
